casebody.data:
No. 742. Tri-Continental Financial Corp. v. Glenmore et al. Mathias F. Correa and Irwin Schneiderman for petitioner. William E. Haudek and Julius Levy for Glenmore et al., respondents. Solicitor General Rankin filed a memorandum for the United States, as amicus curiae.

Reported below: —■ F. 2d .

The motion of petitioner for leave to file supplementary appendix is granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.
